message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe you'd find very useful. I'm thinking of a price around $95. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $70 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $88.  It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from it.
I understand your perspective, but $88 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $82. Can you meet me there?
